headline: Hasbro to Announce Third Quarter 2025 Earnings on October 23, 2025
summary: PAWTUCKET, R.I., October 02, 2025--Hasbro, Inc. (NASDAQ: HAS) announced today that the company’s third quarter financial results will be released before the market open on Thursday, October 23, 2025. Hasbro will webcast its third quarter 2025 earnings conference call at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time.

headline: Dragon’s Milk and DUNGEONS & DRAGONS Continue Legendary Collaboration
summary: Fan-Favorite D20 and Mead Cask Bourbon Return in 2025 With Exclusive Collectible Sets Mead Cask Gift Set Mead Cask Gift Set D20 Dice Tower Set D20 Dice Tower Set HOLLAND, Mich., Oct. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dragon’s Milk from New Holland Brewing & Distilling Co. unveils the next chapter in its collaboration with DUNGEONS & DRAGONS (D&D), the World’s Greatest Roleplaying Game™, under license from Hasbro and Wizards of the Coast.
